system.description:
This spell creates an indestructible maze in the Astral Plane and instantly traps one victim within it. The target does not receive a saving throw.

Escape Time:

The intelligence of the victim determines how long they remain trapped.

  • Non- to Low Intelligence (1-8): [[/r 1d6 #Turns trapped in maze]] turns
  • Average Intelligence (9-12): [[/r 2d20 #Rounds trapped in maze]] rounds
  • High Intelligence (13-17): [[/r 2d4 #Rounds trapped in maze]] rounds
  • Genius Intelligence (18+): [[/r 1d4 #Rounds trapped in maze]] rounds

Mechanics:

  • The victim is removed from the battlefield for the duration.
  • When they escape, they reappear in the exact location where they were originally trapped.
  • The maze is indestructible and exists only in the Astral Plane.
  • Teleportation and dimensional travel cannot bypass this effect.
system.effect: Traps one creature in an astral maze
